exceptions.exn: In environment x, y : R H1 : in_ucirc x y r : is_rat x H3 : Z * Z H4 : let (p, q) := H3 in q <> 0 /\\ y = frac p q The term "r" has type "exists pq : Z * Z, let (p, q) := pq in q <> 0 /\\ x = frac p q" while it is expected to have type "R".
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.
The reference H4 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros x y [H1 H2]. destruct H2 as [r [H3 H4]]. exists r. split. - auto. - unfold interCDr in *. destruct H4 as [H4 _]. auto.
